# Tensor Handle Operations

Note: Functions taking `Tensor` arguments can also take anything accepted by
[`tf.convert_to_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/convert_to_tensor.md).

[TOC]

<h2 id="Tensor_Handle_Operations">Tensor Handle Operations</h2>

TensorFlow provides several operators that allows the user to keep tensors
"in-place" across run calls.

*   [`tf.get_session_handle`](../../api_docs/python/tf/get_session_handle.md)
*   [`tf.get_session_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/get_session_tensor.md)
*   [`tf.delete_session_tensor`](../../api_docs/python/tf/delete_session_tensor.md)
